title: The Black Stallion's Ghost
description: While riding the Black in the Everglades one day, Alec meets a man astride a ghostly gray mare. Alecâ€™s fascination with the man turns to fear as he realizes the man is dangerously close to insanity. Soon Alec and the Black are caught up in a deadly chase through the depths of the Everglades, where a misstep could be fatal.
author: Walter Farley
